name: Likert Type Scale
description: Respondents indicate their level of agreement or disagreement with a  statement using a scale (e.g., strongly agree, agree, neutral, disagree,  strongly disagree).

name: Comments (Open Ended)
description: Respondents provide their own answer or explanation in their own words.

name: Word Cloud
description: Select this option to incorporate a word cloud feature, allowing participants to provide responses in the form of text.

name: Multiple Choice
description: Respondents select from a series of options, selecting one or more choices, where one or more choices may be correct.

name: Single Choice
description: Respondents select from a series of options, selecting a single choice, where only one choice may be correct.

name: Rating
description: Respondents select a rating from a minimum to maximum value.
